attributes.action: Investigate Ofsteds policies on the definition of ADHD as an EBD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Children and young people with Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) are being listed by Ofsted as having Emotional and Behavioural Difficulties. This definition used by Ofsted needs to be changed and that ADHD receives the same attention as that of Asthma, Dyslexia, Autism, Learning Disability etc, etc
